detail_desc: Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Sleeveless top in pima cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with decorative gathers down the sleeves.
Trainers in cotton canvas with a print on one side, elasticated lacing at the front and loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Handbag in grained imitation leather with two handles and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap. Tab and metal fastener at the top and studs on the base. Two outer compartments and one lined compartment with a zip at the top. Size 15x24x34 cm.
Fine-knit T-shirt in a sturdy cotton blend with a stand-up collar in a double layer and slits in the sides.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with short cap sleeves, a seam with a drawstring at the waist and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Unlined.

Biker jacket in imitation suede with a collar, decorative buttons on the lapels and a diagonal zip at the front. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with embroidery, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with raw-edge hems.
Flock-patterned trousers in light twill with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Tapered legs with velvet panels in the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short yoga top in fast-drying functional fabric. Wrapover front with an opening at the top, open section at the back, long sleeves and gathers in the sides.

Leggings with an elasticated waist and smooth trim with overlocked seams at the hems. High waist for a good fit over the tummy. 60 denier.
Flat cap in a cotton weave. Lined.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton and linen weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Oversized jumper in a fine cotton knit with a checked pattern, a roll-edge neckline and low dropped shoulders. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides.
Batik-patterned jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Chino shorts in a linen and cotton weave with a zip fly and button. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Skinny fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a fake fly and button at the waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs with decorative sparkly studs and raw-edge hems. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for a comfortable fit.
Top in soft jersey with long puff sleeves.
Lace mini socks.

Lightly padded sleeping sack in soft jersey with a quilted pattern. Press-stud on one shoulder and a concealed zip in one side that opens from the bottom. Jersey lining. For indoor use only.
Striped poncho in an airy weave with open sides held together by tasselled ties. Slightly longer at the back. Width 100 cm. Length at the front 82 cm.
Knee-length coat in a crêpe weave with a seam and drawstring at the waist, side pockets and no buttons. Unlined.
5-pocket trousers in superstretch twill with a regular waist and skinny legs.
Jacket in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length dress in a textured weave that is wide at the top with rounded shoulders, a V-neck at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves, concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt and a straight skirt with slits in the sides. Unlined.
Knee-length, straight-cut dress in glittery velour with a V-neck and long sleeves. Unlined.
Ribbed vest top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a lace trim around the neckline and armholes and an overlocked hem.
